subject: Off Topic : Head - QA & Testing : Bangalore MNC
msgSnippet: We are looking for a Head -QA & Testing group for an American Company having operations in Bangalore, India. Details below.  Those who meet the requirements
messageBody:
We are looking for a Head -QA & Testing group for an American Company
having operations in Bangalore, India.

Details below. Those who meet the requirements are requested to send
their CVs to John@....

Thanks.
John

======================

Position : Head - QA & Testing

Requirements:

* The person should have at least 10 years experience in the software-
testing domain in software product testing
* Technical degree is a must. BE/B.Tech/MCA only.
* Should have worked in a software product company.
* Past proven managerial ability is a must. The person will be in
charge of the entire QA Testing cycle for the products range
* Should have thorough understanding of Software Test Concepts.
* Exposure to system level testing is also required
* Should have some exposure to multiple Testing tools.
Should have very good written and verbal comm. Skills

Warm Regards,
John Amirtharaj
Head - Staffing Solutions
AlphaeusHR
